titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3648) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude discharges of indebtedness on principal residences from gross income, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-360, by Mr. Cardoza.

The amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Ways and Means now printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution, shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 129.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 703.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H.Res. 703, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Lincoln-Diaz Balart(FL) demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 194 (Roll no. 943).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 193 (Roll no. 944).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/4/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3648 (Mortgage Forgiveness Debt Relief Act of 2007).
